name: Love, wings & flamethrowers
description:
Submission for https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/love-wings-flamethrowers

Sources: https://github.com/torte478/gameJams/tree/happily/happily

Theme: Delay the inevitable

What is love?  Can you live happily ever after? Why are there so many flamethrowers here?
You can find answers inside my game. Welcome!

Controls

  • Arrows — movement
  • Z — jump / fly
  • X — drink
  • R — restart level
  • Mouse —select level/buttons
